Class Fighter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fighter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Archer, Mage, Warrior

    public class Fighter
extends java.lang.Object
    Fighter class for the player

      • Fighter

        public Fighter()
        Constructor for a default fighter (player).

      • Fighter

        public Fighter(int hp,
       int sp,
       int evasion,
       int potions,
       int elixirs,
       int bombs,
       Weapon nWeap,
       Weapon sWeap)
        Constructor for the AI fighter.
        Parameters:
        hp - Initial HP of the AI fighter
        sp - Initial SP of the AI fighter
        evasion - Initial evasion of the AI fighter
        potions - Initial number of potions the AI fighter has
        elixirs - Initial number of elixirs the AI fighter has
        bombs - Initial number of smokebombs the AI fighter has
        nWeap - The basic weapon the AI fighter has
        sWeap - The special weapon the AI fighter has

    • Method Detail

      • rest

        public void rest()
        Rest command for the fighter. Resting will increase hp by 2 and SP by 10.

      • reset

        public void reset()
